verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> out of the whirlwind <S%H9370><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
"Who <S%H4310><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> that darkens <S%H2821><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> By words <S%H4405><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>?
"Now <S%H4994><s%> gird <S%H247><s%> up your loins <S%H2504><s%> like a man, <S%H1397><s%> And I will ask <S%H7592><s%> you, and you instruct <S%H3045><s%> Me!

"Where <S%H375><s%> were you when I laid <S%H3245><s%> the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>? Tell <S%H5046><s%> [Me,] if <S%H518><s%> you have <S%H3045><s%> understanding, <S%H998><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> its measurements, <S%H4461><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%>? Or <S%H176><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> the line <S%H6957><s%> on it?
"On what <S%H4100><s%> were its bases <S%H134><s%> sunk <S%H2883><s%>? Or <S%H176><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> laid <S%H3384><s%> its cornerstone, <S%H68><s%> <S%H6438><s%>

When the morning <S%H1242><s%> stars <S%H3556><s%> sang <S%H7442><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%> for joy <S%H7321><s%>?
"Or [who] enclosed <S%H9353><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> with doors, <S%H1817><s%> When, bursting <S%H1518><s%> forth, <S%H1518><s%> it went <S%H3318><s%> out from the womb; <S%H7358><s%>
When I made <S%H7760><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> its garment, <S%H3830><s%> And thick <S%H6205><s%> darkness <S%H6205><s%> its swaddling <S%H2854><s%> band, <S%H2854><s%>
And I placed <S%H7665><s%> boundaries <S%H2706><s%> on it, And I set <S%H7760><s%> a bolt <S%H1280><s%> and doors, <S%H1817><s%>

And I said, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H6311><s%> far <S%H5704><s%> you shall come, <S%H935><s%> but no <S%H3808><s%> farther; <S%H3254><s%> And here <S%H6311><s%> shall your proud <S%H1347><s%> waves <S%H1530><s%> stop <S%H7896><s%>'?

"Have you ever <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> in your life <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the morning, <S%H1242><s%> [And] caused the dawn <S%H7837><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> its place; <S%H4725><s%>
That it might take <S%H270><s%> hold <S%H270><s%> of the ends <S%H3671><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> And the wicked <S%H7563><s%> be shaken <S%H5287><s%> out of it?
"It is changed <S%H2015><s%> like clay <S%H2563><s%> [under] the seal; <S%H2368><s%> And they stand <S%H3320><s%> forth <S%H3320><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> a garment. <S%H3830><s%>
"And from the wicked <S%H7563><s%> their light <S%H216><s%> is withheld, <S%H4513><s%> And the uplifted <S%H7311><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> is broken. <S%H7665><s%>
"Have you entered <S%H935><s%> into the springs <S%H5033><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>? Or have you walked <S%H1980><s%> in the recesses <S%H2714><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%>?
"Have the gates <S%H8179><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> been revealed <S%H1540><s%> to you? Or have you seen <S%H7200><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of deep <S%H6757><s%> darkness <S%H6757><s%>?
"Have you understood <S%H995><s%> the expanse <S%H7338><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>? Tell <S%H5046><s%> [Me,] if <S%H518><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this.
"Where <S%H335><s%> is the way <S%H1870><s%> to the dwelling <S%H7931><s%> of light <S%H216><s%>? And darkness, <S%H2822><s%> where <S%H335><s%> is its place, <S%H4725><s%>
That you may take <S%H3947><s%> it to its territory, <S%H1366><s%> And that you may discern <S%H995><s%> the paths <S%H9350><s%> to its home <S%H1004><s%>?
"You know, <S%H3045><s%> for you were born <S%H3205><s%> then, <S%H227><s%> And the number <S%H4557><s%> of your days <S%H3117><s%> is great! <S%H7227><s%>
"Have you entered <S%H935><s%> the storehouses <S%H214><s%> of the snow, <S%H7950><s%> Or have you seen <S%H7200><s%> the storehouses <S%H214><s%> of the hail, <S%H1259><s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> I have reserved <S%H2820><s%> for the time <S%H6256><s%> of distress, <S%H9496><s%> For the day <S%H3117><s%> of war <S%H7128><s%> and battle <S%H4421><s%>?
"Where <S%H335><s%> is the way <S%H1870><s%> that the light <S%H216><s%> is divided, <S%H2505><s%> [Or] the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H6921><s%> scattered <S%H6327><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>?
"Who <S%H4310><s%> has cleft <S%H6385><s%> a channel <S%H8585><s%> for the flood, <S%H7858><s%> Or a way <S%H1870><s%> for the thunderbolt <S%H6963><s%>; <S%H2385><s%>
To bring <S%H4305><s%> rain <S%H4305><s%> on a land <S%H776><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> people, <S%H376><s%> [On] a desert <S%H4057><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> a man <S%H120><s%> in it,
To satisfy <S%H7646><s%> the waste <S%H9585><s%> and desolate <S%H4875><s%> land, And to make the seeds <S%H4161><s%> of grass <S%H1877><s%> to sprout <S%H6779><s%>?
"Has <S%H3426><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> a father? Or <S%H1><s%> who <S%H176><s%> has begotten <S%H4310><s%> the drops <S%H3205><s%> of dew <S%H96><s%>?

"From whose <S%H4310><s%> womb <S%H990><s%> has come <S%H3318><s%> the ice <S%H7140><s%>? And the frost <S%H9214><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has given <S%H3205><s%> it birth <S%H3205><s%>?
"Water <S%H4325><s%> becomes <S%H2244><s%> hard <S%H2244><s%> like stone, <S%H68><s%> And the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> is imprisoned. <S%H3920><s%>
"Can you bind <S%H7194><s%> the chains <S%H4575><s%> of the Pleiades, <S%H3598><s%> Or <S%H176><s%> loose <S%H6605><s%> the cords <S%H4189><s%> of Orion <S%H3685><s%>?
"Can you lead <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> a constellation <S%H4216><s%> in its season, <S%H6256><s%> And guide <S%H5148><s%> the Bear <S%H5906><s%> with her satellites <S%H1121><s%>?
"Do you know <S%H3045><s%> the ordinances <S%H2708><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> Or <S%H518><s%> fix <S%H7760><s%> their rule <S%H4896><s%> over the earth <S%H776><s%>?
"Can you lift <S%H7311><s%> up your voice <S%H6963><s%> to the clouds, <S%H5645><s%> So that an abundance <S%H8229><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> may cover <S%H3680><s%> you?
"Can you send <S%H7971><s%> forth lightnings <S%H1300><s%> that they may go <S%H1980><s%> And say <S%H559><s%> to you, 'Here <S%H2009><s%> we are'?

"Who <S%H4310><s%> has put <S%H7896><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> in the innermost <S%H2910><s%> being, <S%H2910><s%> Or <S%H176><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%> to the mind <S%H7907><s%>?
"Who <S%H4310><s%> can count <S%H5608><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> by wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> Or tip <S%H7901><s%> the water <S%H9311><s%> jars <S%H9311><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%>
When the dust <S%H6083><s%> hardens <S%H3332><s%> into a mass, <S%H4165><s%> And the clods <S%H7263><s%> stick <S%H1692><s%> together <S%H1692><s%>?
"Can you hunt <S%H6679><s%> the prey <S%H2964><s%> for the lion, <S%H3833><s%> Or satisfy <S%H4390><s%> the appetite <S%H9130><s%> of the young <S%H3715><s%> lions, <S%H3715><s%>
When <S%H3588><s%> they crouch <S%H7817><s%> in [their] dens, <S%H4585><s%> [And] lie <S%H695><s%> in wait <S%H695><s%> in [their] lair <S%H5521><s%>?

"Who <S%H4310><s%> prepares <S%H3559><s%> for the raven <S%H6158><s%> its nourishment, <S%H9479><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> its young <S%H3206><s%> cry <S%H7768><s%> to God, <S%H410><s%> And wander <S%H8582><s%> about without <S%H1097><s%> food <S%H400><s%>?
